Html:
I'm sending in
InputSimulator.SimulateTextEntry("What's up");
and I just get ppppppppp
"Hello" gives ooooo
It gives the last character of the string only.

This happens only running in the editor of unity3d, but not if I do a build as an .exe. It's very frustrating to work on. This is probably unique to unity3d but I was wondering if anybody had any ideas on why there would be a difference.
